  A1'(X) = 0.0
  C1(X)  = 0.0
  F1(X)  = X * ( X + 3 ) * exp ( X )
  U1(X)  = X * ( 1 - X ) * exp ( X )

FD1D_BVP_TEST03
  A1(X)  = 1.0
  A1'(X) = 0.0
  C3(X)  = 2.0 * X
  F3(X)  = - X * ( 2 * X * X - 3 * X - 3 ) * exp ( X )
  U1(X)  = X * ( 1 - X ) * exp ( X )

FD1D_BVP_TEST04
  A2(X)  = 1.0 + X * X
  A2'(X) = 2.0 * X
  C1(X)  = 0.0
  F4(X)  = ( X + 3 X^2 + 5 X^3 + X^4 ) * exp ( X )
  U1(X)  = X * ( 1 - X ) * exp ( X )

FD1D_BVP_TEST05
  A3(X)  = 1.0 + X * X for X <= 1/3
         = 7/9 + X     for      1/3 < X
  A3'(X) = 2.0 * X     for X <= 1/3
           1           for      1/3 < X
  C1(X)  = 0.0
  F5(X)  = ( X + 3 X^2 + 5 X^3 + X^4 ) * exp ( X )
                       for X <= 1/3
         = ( - 1 + 10/3 X + 43/9 X^2 + X^3 ) .* exp ( X )
                       for      1/3 <= X
  U1(X)  = X * ( 1 - X ) * exp ( X )

  Number of nodes = 11
  X1 = 0.000000
  X2 = 1.000000
